The game is fun and i really enjoy playing it. The community can be quite a wild card though.

The replay value is great, and for the most part, the game feels very fair. Skill is rewarded.

The only issue is that the community can be toxic.

I'm no pro, but i love this game. It's just a shooter. But it has it's quirks for everybody. There's a competitive mode, casuals and deathmatch. But what really grabs me i believe is the art style and flow. The game flows and plays just flawlessly even to this day it's on par with some of the new age shooters.10/10 recommend
